Longsword.Name: Longsword
Longsword.Description: A versatile blade favored by warriors and knights.

Wooden Shield.Name: Wooden Shield
Wooden Shield.Description: A sturdy wooden shield reinforced with metal bands.

Healing Potion.Name: Healing Potion
Healing Potion.Description: A red liquid that restores health when drunk.

Bedroll.Name: Bedroll
Bedroll.Description: A comfortable sleeping roll for camping.

Component Pouch.Name: Component Pouch
Component Pouch.Description: A small pouch containing spell components.

Thieves Tools.Name: Thieves Tools
Thieves Tools.Description: Tools for picking locks and disarming traps.

Holy Symbol.Name: Holy Symbol
Holy Symbol.Description: A divine focus for casting spells.

Dagger.Name: Dagger
Dagger.Description: A small but deadly blade, easily concealed.

Mace.Name: Mace
Mace.Description: A heavy metal head on a reinforced handle.

Ringmail Armor.Name: Ringmail Armor
Ringmail Armor.Description: Heavy armor made of interlocking metal rings.

Leather Armor.Name: Leather Armor
Leather Armor.Description: Light armor made of treated leather.

Robes.Name: Robes
Robes.Description: Comfortable robes with subtle magical enhancements.

Studded Leather Armor.Name: Studded Leather Armor
Studded Leather Armor.Description: Leather armor reinforced with metal studs.

Shortsword.Name: Shortsword
Shortsword.Description: A light, easily handled sword favored by rogues and swashbucklers.

Captain's Sword.Name: Captain's Sword
Captain's Sword.Description: A finely crafted longsword with Northhold's crest on the pommel.

Crystal Staff.Name: Crystal Staff
Crystal Staff.Description: A wooden staff crowned with a resonating crystal that hums with magical energy.

Hunter's Bow.Name: Hunter's Bow
Hunter's Bow.Description: A sturdy shortbow with carefully maintained string and grip.

Merchant's Scale.Name: Merchant's Scale
Merchant's Scale.Description: A precise balance scale for weighing coins and valuable materials.
Merchant's Scale.Effect: Advantage on checks to determine item value

Resonance Stone.Name: Resonance Stone
Resonance Stone.Description: A crystal that vibrates in harmony with nearby magical energies.
Resonance Stone.Effect: Can detect magical auras within 30 feet

Backpack.Name: Backpack
Backpack.Description: A sturdy backpack for carrying equipment.
Backpack.Effect: Can carry up to 30 pounds of gear

Rope (50 feet).Name: Rope (50 feet)
Rope (50 feet).Description: Strong hemp rope suitable for climbing or binding.

Crystal Heart Shard.Name: Crystal Heart Shard
Crystal Heart Shard.Description: A fragment from the great crystal heart, pulsing with energy.

Effect.Special: Glows in presence of other crystal heart pieces

Torch.Name: Torch
Torch.Description: A wooden torch that provides light for 1 hour.

Effect.Light: Bright light 20 ft., dim light 20 ft.

Climber's Kit.Name: Climber's Kit
Climber's Kit.Description: A set of tools for climbing and rappelling.
Climber's Kit.Effect: Advantage on checks to climb or rappel

Cooking Pot.Name: Cooking Pot
Cooking Pot.Description: A sturdy metal pot for cooking meals.
Cooking Pot.Effect: Can cook meals for up to 4 people

Mess Kit.Name: Mess Kit
Mess Kit.Description: A set of utensils for eating meals on the go.

Potion of Invisibility.Name: Potion of Invisibility
Potion of Invisibility.Description: A clear liquid that renders the drinker invisible for 1 hour.

Potion of Fire Breath.Name: Potion of Fire Breath
Potion of Fire Breath.Description: A fiery liquid that allows the drinker to breathe fire for 1 minute.

Tinderbox.Name: Tinderbox
Tinderbox.Description: Steel, flint, and tinder for starting fires.

Waterskin.Name: Waterskin
Waterskin.Description: A leather container that holds water.

Crystal Pendant.Name: Crystal Pendant
Crystal Pendant.Description: A crystal from the caves, wrapped in silver wire.
